summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2650, for the improvement of College Street from 31st Avenue South to 34th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading the same where necessary, by construction and reconstruction of all watermains with their necessary appurtenances, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31113 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
